attributes.htmlcode:
<form class="upload-form" id="resource-form-update">
	<input id="image" type="file" name="res_file" onchange="upload()"/>
</form>

<script>

var form_orig = {};

function getFormData($form){
	var unindexed_array = $form.serializeArray();
	var indexed_array = {};

	$.map(unindexed_array, function(n, i){
		indexed_array[n['name']] = n['value'];
	});

	return indexed_array;
}

function upload() {
	return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
		console.log("Promise");
		var frm = document.getElementById("resource-form-update");
		form_orig = getFormData($('#o_eb0d4f78_c0d5_4a05_90f3_022ebda47964'));
		var formData = new FormData(frm);
		var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhr.open("POST", "upload.py", true);
		xhr.onload = function(event) {
			if (xhr.status == 200)
				resolve(xhr.responseText);
			else
				reject(xhr);
		}
		xhr.onerror = function(event) {
			reject(event);
		}
		xhr.send(formData);
	})

	.then(function(guid) {
		form_orig.res_file_id = guid.slice(0, -2);
		execEventBinded('eb0d4f78_c0d5_4a05_90f3_022ebda47964', 'submit', form_orig);
	})

	.catch(function(error) {
		console.log('error', error)
	})
}

</script>
